src
===

.. py:module:: src

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Source code package for Esercizio Esteso CrewAI Multi-Agent System.

   This package contains the main source code for the CrewAI-based multi-agent
   system designed for automated documentation generation and research workflows.

   Modules
   -------
   esercizio_esteso : package
       Main application package containing flows, crews, tools, and utilities.

   .. rubric:: Notes

   This is the root source package that contains all the application logic,
   agent definitions, workflows, and supporting utilities for the multi-agent
   documentation generation system.



Submodules
----------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   /autoapi/src/esercizio_esteso/index
